sentences.en: A 26% water rate increase is more than most residents can stomach .
sentences.cn: 水费涨 26% 让大多数居民无法接受。

sentences.en: Foods and fluids are mixed in the stomach by its muscular contractions.
sentences.cn: 通过胃部肌肉的收缩食物和流质在胃中混合。

sentences.en: Foods that ferment quickly in the stomach are excellent natural laxatives.
sentences.cn: 能在肠胃里迅速发酵的食物是绝佳的天然通便剂。

sentences.en: He has a six-pack stomach and is extremely well-proportioned.
sentences.cn: 他腹肌发达，体型完美。

sentences.en: He turned round and punched Carlos in the stomach.
sentences.cn: 他转过身一拳打在卡洛斯的腹部。

sentences.en: His stomach had grown more prominent with every passing year.
sentences.cn: 他的肚子一年比一年鼓。

sentences.en: His stomach was full of food.
sentences.cn: 他的胃里塞满了食物。

sentences.en: I felt sick to my stomach with sadness for them.
sentences.cn: 我为他们感到十分痛心。

sentences.en: I had a funny feeling in the pit of my stomach.
sentences.cn: 我心头有种怪怪的感觉。

sentences.en: I think better on a full stomach.
sentences.cn: 我吃饱了才能更好地思考。

sentences.en: I was so hungry my stomach hurt.
sentences.cn: 我饿得胃都痛了。

sentences.en: I’ve never been able to stomach seafood.
sentences.cn: 我从来都吃不了海鲜。

sentences.en: It wasn't anything serious. A mild stomach upset, that's all.
sentences.cn: 没什么大不了的。只是胃有点不舒服，没别的。

sentences.en: Leigh rolled over on her stomach to tan her back.
sentences.cn: 莉翻了个身趴下，开始晒后背。

sentences.en: My bulging thighs and flabby stomach made me depressed.
sentences.cn: 我大腿太粗，肚子上也净是赘肉，让我很发愁。

sentences.en: She continued to have severe stomach cramps, aches, fatigue, and depression.
sentences.cn: 她仍然患有严重的胃痉挛，感觉疼痛、疲乏、抑郁。

sentences.en: She dropped out after 20 kilometres with stomach trouble.
sentences.cn: 20公里后她因胃痛而退出了比赛。

sentences.en: The bruise on his stomach ached with a steady throb.
sentences.cn: 他腹部的擦伤一直阵阵作痛。

sentences.en: The other injured man had a superficial stomach wound.
sentences.cn: 另一名受伤男子是腹部的皮外伤。

sentences.en: There was a knot of tension in his stomach.
sentences.cn: 他紧张得心揪得紧紧的。

sentences.en: You can make your stomach look flatter instantly by improving your posture.
sentences.cn: 通过采取更好的坐姿，你的腹部马上就会看起来平坦一些。

phrases.tran_cn: （看或做讨厌的事时）坚强的性格
给养充足的士兵（或工人）才能很好地战斗（或工作）

phrases.phrase: on a full (或 an empty) stomach

phrases.tran_cn: n. 肠胃不适，消化不良

trans.tran_en: the organ inside your body where food begins to be  digested
to be able to accept something, especially something unpleasant
